New publication

Oct 21, 2014
1 minute read

I participated in a project examining the genomes and gene expression of prokaryotic and eukaryptic communities on a transect in the easter subtropical Pacific ocean while collaborating with scientists at the J. Craig Venter Institute. There were a number of scientists from The Scripps Institution of Oceanography involved as well.
